attributes.action: get salman jafri and others like him back on twitter by pm and other politicans to open twitter accounts and using their power of their twitter account to change policy at twitter
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Twitter have taken a request to have taken off line and off search due to my continous tweeting about the crime in kilburn . i would various head of states and normal "non entity" politicians to open an account to put their view across to ppl at large and use those account to petition twitter to allow ppl to continue to use the public timeline and search

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
